text: Émile Blessig (born 27 May 1947 in Saverne) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Bas-Rhin department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:People from Saverne Category:Union for French Democracy politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Social Right Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Émile Blessig
